title: Madhya Bharat. Part 2
creator_credit: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and K Khandpur
brief_description: Several cities of Madhya Bharat, including Indore, the chief commercial city of central India, and Ujjain. Shows the many factories in Indore, the cottage industries, temple architecture and modern buildings.
creator_credit_for_label: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and K Khandpur
